overview: After working with director Clive McLean, posing for the ultra-raw shoots of Hustler and Barely Legal is hard, sweaty work. When the babes are done, they hit the showers for a steamy soak. Warm water and suds are no match for their filthy minds though; by the time their tongues, fingers and dildos scour every hard-to-reach spot, the ladies are stickier than ever.
title: Hot Showers 3
